CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 1', 'A National Historic Landmark', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 2', 'On or eligible for the National Register at the National significance level.', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 3', 'On or eligible for the National Register at the State or Local significance level.', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 4', 'Potentially eligible for the National Register based on evaluation', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 5', 'Likely eligible for the National Register: Not yet evaluated', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 6', 'Not Historic, but significant', IF(TEXT( Historic_Landmark_Status__c )= 'Class 7', 'Not Historic, but significant','')))))))
CustomField.label: Historic Status Description
